sentences.en: a man who would never share his innermost thoughts with anyone
sentences.cn: 一个永远不会告诉别人自己内心深处想法的人

sentences.en: An electron in the innermost orbit has the least energy.
sentences.cn: 最里面的轨道上的电子能量最低.

sentences.en: He reveals his innermost feelings only to his best friend.
sentences.cn: 他把最隐秘的想法只告诉最好的朋友.

sentences.en: Her steel - grey eye goes through you and sees your innermost secrets.
sentences.cn: 她那双钢灰色的眼睛能看穿你的内心,能发现你最深处的秘密.

sentences.en: I could not express my innermost feelings to anyone.
sentences.cn: 我不能向任何人表达我内心深处的感情。

sentences.en: It is concerned not merely with the texture of life, but with its innermost core.
sentences.cn: 它不仅涉及生活的内容, 而且涉及生活最深处的核心问题.

sentences.en: Know that Diablo's innermost sanctum is hidden by five seals.
sentences.cn: 要知道迪亚波罗最深处的圣殿隐藏在五个封印之后.

sentences.en: Luckily we put our valuable in innermost layer of our pouch.
sentences.cn: 幸好我们都把重要文件和钱放在最里面的暗格.

sentences.en: Many patients have told me their innermost thoughts.
sentences.cn: 很多患者告诉过我他们内心深处的想法。

sentences.en: My innermost feelings are the free flow stream, never stops to front!
sentences.cn: 我的内心是自由流淌的溪水, 汩汩向前永远不停.

sentences.en: She never abandoned her attempts to plumb my innermost emotions.
sentences.cn: 她从未放弃过探究我内心深处情感的尝试。

sentences.en: She put the receipt into the innermost pocket of her bag.
sentences.cn: 她把收据放在提包最里面的口袋里。

sentences.en: Stripes that wound scour away evil, And strokes reach the innermost parts.
sentences.cn: 箴20:30鞭伤除净人的罪恶.打能入人的心腹.

sentences.en: Suppresses the innermost feelings to confuse lonely oneself greets with the smile.
sentences.cn: 压制着内心的寂寞迷惑自己用微笑来迎接-.

sentences.en: the innermost depths of the cave
The innermost region of cotton is called lumen.
sentences.cn: 棉纤维的最内层组织叫中腔.

sentences.en: Words fail me where silent smiles and tears well express my innermost feelings.
sentences.cn: 言语是不够表现我的心情的,只有独自微笑或落泪才足以把内心揭露在外面一些来.

words.tran_cn: 心底的，内心深处的；最深的
向内的；内部的；精神的；本质上的；熟悉的
进入；当选；（服装等）时髦；在屋里
按照（表示方式）；从事于；在…之内
内心的；最里面的，最深处的；秘密的

trans.tran_cn: 最深处的，隐私的，最隐秘的
trans.tran_en: your innermost feelings, desires etc are your most personal and secret ones
